abstract: Fiat Chrysler announces recall of about 843,000 pickup trucks that federal regulators have identified as having side-impact airbag sensor malfunctions; defect could allow airbags to deploy if door is slammed too hard.
lead_paragraph: The recall includes about 667,000 vehicles in the United States and covers the Ram 1500, 2500 and 3500 from the 2013-15 model years.

headline.main: Fiat Chrysler to Recall Pickup Trucks With Problematic Airbags
headline.print_headline: Pickup Trucks to Be Recalled as Door Slams Set Off Airbags

snippet: The recall includes about 667,000 vehicles in the United States and covers the Ram 1500, 2500 and 3500 from the 2013-15 model years.

keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
